alert.note: Alert for Northwest Randolph; Southeast Nicholas (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 17 at 2:07PM EST until December 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM MONDAY TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southeast Nicholas and Northwest Randolph Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM Monday to 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Additional information can be found at https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.
